children.caption: Let Out
children.toolTip: Lets out the selected occupant, or the most recently eaten occupant

children.text:
^cyan;Predator Transformations^reset;
 
First off, holding ^green;[F]^reset; will allow you to bring up an action wheel, under normal circumstances the ^red;X^reset; at the bottom will return you to your original form.
 
The other actions on the action wheel can be clicked to assign to a ^yellow;Vore Controller^reset; in the respective hand, or will give you a new one if there isn't one in hand. Releasing ^green;[F]^reset; will attempt to perform the selected action once, if a ^yellow;Vore Controller^reset; has been assigned an action, it can be used to attempt that action at any time.
 
Under certain transformation conditions the ability to revert to your original form may not be there, and you might not be able to change size either, meaning you're stuck in that form until you find a way to cure it, or find a way to control the transformation... if you do gain control, the transformation will be unlocked in the ^yellow;Predator Selector^reset; tech for you to transform whenever you wish.
 
Final note, the ^green;[Shift]^reset; key can only be detected if you are holding a ^yellow;Vore Controller^reset;.

^cyan;Predator Object Information^reset;
 
Predator objects come in two parts, a ^yellow;Predator Core^reset;, and a ^yellow;Predator Spawner^reset;. They both appear in the materials inventory tab. The ^yellow;Predator Spawner^reset; is the object that can be placed in the world, any ^yellow;Predator Core^reset; can be bound to any ^yellow;Predator Spawner^reset; by ^green;[Right Clicking]^reset; the ^yellow;Predator Core^reset; on top of the ^yellow;Predator Spawner^reset; in your inventory, or a chest, or by placing the ^yellow;Predator Spawner^reset; in the world and ^green;interacting^reset; with it while holding a ^yellow;Predator Core^reset; in your hand.
 
Once a ^yellow;Predator Spawner^reset; has a ^yellow;Predator Core^reset; bound to it, it will spawn its ^yellow;Predator^reset; when placed in the world as an object.
 
Once a ^yellow;Predator^reset; has spawned, you can typically ^green;[Interact]^reset; with them to get them to perform a ^yellow;Vore Action^reset; on you, or move between ^yellow;States^reset;.
 
Some ^yellow;Predators^reset; may be able to accept a ^yellow;Modifier Item^reset; these can do many things, for example, some may change their ^orange;Belly Effect^reset; or maybe ^orange;Fatten^reset; them up. The modifiers can be applied the same way as the core.

^cyan;Stand State^reset;
 
While Standing you can move around just like a player normally can.
 
The ^yellow;Oral Vore^reset; action can be used to ^yellow;eat^reset; prey, you may also let prey back out of your ^yellow;mouth^reset; with the ^green;[G]^reset; key.
 
The ^yellow;Special Attack^reset; action can be used to spray a stream of water at your foes.
 
The ^yellow;Physical Attack^reset; action can be used to bap at your foes.
 
Tapping ^green;[Down]^reset; will let you ^cyan;sit^reset; down.

^cyan;Sit State^reset;
 
While sitting, your prey will not be able to escape your belly.
 
Tapping ^green;[Up]^reset; will let you ^cyan;stand^reset; back up.
 
Tapping ^green;[Down]^reset; will make you ^cyan;lay^reset; down, and if someone is in front of you when you do, they will be ^orange;pinned^reset; beneath you!

^cyan;Lay State^reset;
 
While laying, your prey will not be able to escape your belly.
 
Tapping ^green;[Up]^reset; will let you ^cyan;sit^reset; back up.
 
Tapping ^green;[Left]^reset; or ^green;[Right]^reset; will make you roll over onto your ^cyan;back^reset;, if you have someone ^orange;pinned^reset; they'll then be ^orange;laying^reset; on your belly.
 
If you have someone ^orange;pinned^reset; you'll be able to ^green;[Click]^reset; to lick them! You can also ^yellow;absorb^reset; them by pressing the ^green;[Space]^reset; key.

^cyan;Back State^reset;
 
While laying, on your back, your prey may be able to struggle out of your ^yellow;butt^reset;.
 
Other players may also be able to ^green;[Interact]^reset; with you to ^orange;lay^reset; on your belly like a bed!
 
If you press ^green;[Down]^reset; you'll be able to ^orange;hug^reset; your belly, and whoever may be ^orange;laying^reset; on it. And if you've ^orange;hugged^reset; someone, pressing the ^green;[Space]^reset; key will let you ^yellow;absorb^reset; them!
 
Tapping ^green;[Left]^reset; or ^green;[Right]^reset; will make you roll over to ^cyan;lay^reset; on your belly, if you have someone ^orange;laying^reset; on your belly, they'll be ^orange;pinned^reset; underneath you.

^cyan;Smol State^reset;
 
While smol, you will move around just like any player normally can, and prey will not be able to struggle out of you... but you may find it hard to move with even one inside... with two... you'd be so full you'll roll around like a ball, your prey might even be able to roll you around from the inside.
 
So as long as you aren't a ball...
 
The ^yellow;Special Attack^reset; action can be used to spray a stream of water at your foes.
 
The ^yellow;Physical Attack^reset; action can be used to bap at your foes.
